actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.
Reported to House from the Committee on House Administration, H. Rept. 93-859.

official_title: Resolution providing for the printing of additional copies of the House report entitled "Concentration By Competing Raw Fuel Industries in the Energy Market and its Impact on Small Business," House Report No. 92-719.
